KeyRepoServer.description: This is uesd to represent the host name or IP address and port number of SKLM servers.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HostName.description: Represents the host name or IP address of the SKLM server.
HostName.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the host name or IP address of the SKLM server.

Port.description: Represents the port number for the SKLM server. The default value is 5695.
Port.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the port number for the SKLM server. The default value is 5695.

LenovoSecureKeyLifecycle.description: This is Lenovo extended secure key lifecycle service properties.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClientCertificate.description: The link to a collection of certificates used for the client of secure key lifecycle service.
ClientCertificate.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type CertificateCollection.

DeviceGroup.description: This property is uesd to manage the keys for Self Encrypting Drvies(SED) on multiple servers as a group. The default value for this property is Lenovo_SYSTEM_X_SED.
DeviceGroup.longDescription: This property is uesd to manage the keys for Self Encrypting Drvies(SED) on multiple servers as a group. The default value for this property is Lenovo_SYSTEM_X_SED.

KeyRepoServers.description: Represents the key repository servers of the SKLM.
KeyRepoServers.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the key repository servers of the SKLM.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Protocol.longDescription: This optional value is SKLM or KMIP. The valid values for this property are specified through the Redfish. AllowableValues annotation. `SKLM` indicates to Legacy protocol only for IBM SKLM servers. `KMIP` indicates to KMIP supporting servers.

ServerCertificate.description: The link to a collection of certificates used for the server of secure key lifecycle service.
ServerCertificate.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type CertificateCollection.

title: #LenovoSecureKeyLifecycle.v1_0_0.LenovoSecureKeyLifecycle
